entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code cleanup supports all code style rules #58086
  • Ensure Default editorconfig in Visual Studio is the same as the one that ships in the .NET SDK #58085
  • ECUI supports naming styles #58084
  • Intellisense doesn't work on pointers in the context of parameters #58081
  • Source Generators: Graceful cancellation for timing #58080
  • IOperation support for implicit Index/Range indexer over non-array types #58079
  • ConvertNamespaceCommandHandler performs an unexpected Format Document operation #58078
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CommandLine.UnitTests.CommandLineTests.ArgumentParsing is flaky #58077
  • Add compiler warning when void delagate returns Task #58076
  • Implementation of extension method causes ArgumentOutOfRangeException #58074
  • AdditionalLocations for CS8618 in DiagnosticSuppressor #58073

Closed

  • "An expression tree may not contain an interpolated string handler conversion" on Querable.Where() #58070
  • Runtime crash due to assigning a null value to a non-nullable reference using null-forgiving operator and using the null reference #58033
  • SyntaxTrivia needs a FunFacts property #58065

PullRequests

Created

  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • Implement Naming Styles for editorconfig UI #58075
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58067
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Update OneOffInsertion.ps1 file path #58083
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.9-vs-deps #57508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.11-vs-deps #57482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reference new debugger bits #58051
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Update features/rename_ui_rework #58068
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required
  • Remove IDE0051 suppression #48245
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix await completion for expression body lambda #58042
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58061
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58062
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust doc comment for `SyntaxFactory.ParseTokens` API #58064
    Area-Compilers
  • Add nullability annotation to CopyAnnotationsTo() #57992
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Standardize list pattern lowering on `Index` constructor. #58055
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Update new UI after design meeting #58047
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Fix placement of trivia inside an interpolation #57989
    Area-Compilers
  • Report a level 7 warning for lower-cased type names #56905
    Area-Compilers
  • Factor nullability logic for placeholders #58036
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.7-vs-deps #57504
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Make scripting work in single-file deployments #57910
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle frames without text b… #58049
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P2
  • Fix removal and addition of analyzer in same batch #58024
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix metadata references declaration #58059
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
